TITLE: Group Work
DEF: Students working together to complete a task or solve a problem
TASK: The Group Work pattern enhances the cooperative experience where students work together to complete a task or solve a problem. This pattern promotes collaboration, problem-solving skills, and a deeper understanding of the subject matter. Key challenges include effective group formation, clear task expectations, and management of group dynamics. Ensure clear task definition and make use of AI for efficient group formation and monitoring.
